overview:
Abayomi Ayoola is an IT consultant with years of experience. He is an avid reader and researcher.

Abayomi Ayoola is the founder of Tricepts Resources, a firm formed in Nigeria and into training of individual, SME’s and corporate organization on open source technology and it’s usefulness to their daily business processes.

Before now, he has worked in administrative capacity in an engineering and construction company in Lagos, Nigeria. He also had a stint with Skye Bank, Plc in the year 2007 before proceeding to Finland for his bachelors in Information Technology.

He holds a diploma in Business Administration and Management from the Federal Polytechnic, Ilaro and is a certified public speaker. He is presently pursuing his Masters in Information Systems
